Stob Ban (Grey Corries)

Hear pronunciation Press to hear pronunciation

Stob Ban is a fine cone-shaped mountain almost hidden behind the much higher Grey Corries range.

 You have not climbed Stob Ban (Grey Corries).

Region: Fort William

Altitude: 977 metres

Users' Rating:
  • Currently 3.90/5
Rating: 3.9/5 (60 votes cast)

You must be registered and signed-in to vote

Detailed route description and map

Stob Ban (Grey Corries) from above Corriechoille

Other routes and challenges

The route above could be done as a prelude to the Grey Corries, descending from Stob Ban to the bealach before the steep ascent to Stob Choire Claurigh.

Walker-friendly accommodation in the area

Spean Bridge Hotels

Spean Bridge B&B

Spean Bridge Cottages

Lochaber Hostels
